Auckland construction and oil industry figures charged in steel beam meth bust https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-construction-and-oil-industry-figures-charged-in-steel-beam-meth-bust/PBVLPOMJSZC4FH6JN4AAKBF7EQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-construction-and-oil-industry-figures-charged-in-steel-beam-meth-bust/PBVLPOMJSZC4FH6JN4AAKBF7EQ/ George Block, Jared SavageHigh-flying pair among five men before the courts over seized drugs. Sat, 19 Oct 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Police and Customs found 515kg of methamphetamine inside these steel beams imported from the United States in September 2024. Five men, aged between 31 and 51, were arrested and charged with drug offences following Operation Girder. One of the men arrested in Operation Girder was also charged with the illegal possession of a military-style firearm and ammunition.Photo / NZ Police
